评论概述: Very tight and does not offer in between sizes.
评论详情: Im size 9.5 size it’s too tight and size 10 too big. If you are in between sizes this might not work.

I recently purchased these shoes for exercising and jogging, and I’m really happy with them! They are lightweight and comfortable, much better for someone who doesn’t enjoy the feel of traditional thick, cushy soles. Also, the sizing guide worked well for me. I usually wear 11.5 and sized down as recommended since only 11 and 12 were available, and it worked great. I would prefer slightly wider insoles (minus a star), but I swapped them out with some spares I had at home, and they now feel perfect. So far, I’ve used them for three exercise sessions, and I think they are a great deal for the price.

We have purchased 2 pair of whitin and were pleased with shoes. When we purchased 2nd pair my husband noticied they were tighter fit than the first so we sent back and ordered next size up. They arrived and he was pleased with purchase so we ordered 3rd pair in different color with the last size purchased. (We have now gone up a size) when they arrived left shoe fit perfect and right was too small:( Now to return and order another size UP? My husbands foot is not growing the shoes are not all the same. I've been shoeless and active me whole life, these things feel amazing and I absolutely destroy shoes. I love the style, the size fits nicely, super light and your foot slips right on. These shoes never busted on me, they smelled so bad from using them I had to stop because of the smell. The now my river and trail mucks.

Seem like nice well built shoes but the sizing is way off. I wear a size 10 (43) in every shoe I own - Nike, Hoka, Merrill, etc. Size 10 in these are about an inch to big. I didn't try them on until it was to late to return. It has a nice wide toe box. I would buy again, just a smaller size though.

I usually don't review anything on here however these shoes are amazing. I have worn them everyday for the last year maybe more..? I also wear these when I run. Concrete and trail running. I have probably ran close to 50 mi total in these shoes. My pair are scuffed from the use but they are still holding up and are still comfortable. I will be buying another pair in the future. Definitely recommend these for those of you beginning your barefoot journey.
I like these shoes wish they had 1/2 sizes
Good quality. Buy a size larger.

I use the running shoes for my treadmill only (indoor use). It’s perfect for jogging and running. A well designed product that straps snug well without the lace you find other traditional shoes. Love it. Will buy again (same color) once this gets worn out.
I absolutely love these shoes! They are comfortable, they are cute, they are cost efficient they literally check all my boxes!
Surprisingly comfortable. I've put a few miles on them outside. Not bad.

A few years ago I got a pair of WHITIN flat shoes and loved them. They fit great, and lasted forever in the gym and for sidewalk jogging. I was happy to find them on Amazon again, but extremely disappointed with the new pair.  I got the same size as before, but this time they are at least a full size smaller (despite having the same size marked on the shoe). The toebox is also VERY NARROW compared to the previous pair. Don't bother with these shoes if you need a wide toebox. Even if you ordered a size larger than normal, I'm sure they would still be cramped in the toe.  Really frustrating to get such inconsistent sizing with the same brand over the years.
This shoe is VERY comfortable! Use these shoes when working out, pulling sleds, soles are very durable thus far!!

I like the quality and the design of these shoes. Very comfortable and great for riding my bike and playing with my dog. Bought another pair liked them so much. Easy to put on and take off and they breathe well so as not to have foot slipping in your shoe. Great grip on any surface
Love these shoes

Design is great and very comfortable to use and lace up. Size is perfect. Checked it with size guide. Definitely will take more shoes of this brand. It's the best barefoot shoes for this price range!
I absolutely love my WHITIN shoes. They are comfortable, durable, and breathable. I have a pair for everything.
I like the snug fit, the shoe itself looks durable and sturdy.
Very comfortable

They aren’t very comfortable plus mine ripped after simply walking in them for 3 months I would steer clear of this product there are so many better alternatives like vibram on the market

I am just starting my Barefoot Shoe journey and I needed a pair of walking shoes for some rucking that I do in the mornings. I went with these and I'm glad I did. They are lightweight and comfortable with good arch support for a barefoot shoes. The soles are extremely flexible but they still offer amazing grip with excellent slip resistance.  The style is great however I feel that they could benefit from being water resistant
These shoes are sturdy and comfortable in the cooler weather here in west central AZ (at 4,500"), but a bit warm during the summers.

Shoes are really surprisingly comfortable. I wear them almost all the time especially outside. I bought the grey ones before and, while they are great, I recommend a 1/2 size up which is what I did with these. They’re very lightweight and excellent shoes that just don’t feel like they’re on.

These shoes are hit and miss, I've bought 4 pairs of this brand. If you get a good pair, they're awesome. My issue with 3 pairs, 2 of which the insole sits weird up at my toes and creates a weird feeling when running or jumping. The set of sneakers style I bought, I've only had them 2 weeks and the sole is already starting to come unglued for the fabric. The "trainer" shoes with the strap across, those are the one that I've experienced the insole issue with recently but a past pair has the same issue as well. Again, they're good if you get a good pair.

Hard to beat for the price. Would give a 5 star, the sizes are hit or miss. I wear a 10.5w mens us, based of the chart I would have ordered the 43, instead I read reviews and someone suggested 44. 44 fits great. Very comfortable. Durability will be tested.

However, this may be snug by design.  I will update my review if the wear indicates they are too small.

These sneakers are nice. Had to return them but there's nothing wrong with the shoes. Ordered a size that I thought would fit but it didn't. Thus, the issue with purchasing shoes on-line. Will try again. Thank goodness for Staples!
Comfy and fit well. They shipped fast.

My second pair, but I got a lot of use and mileage, walking on asphalt, salt water & beaches.  The only negative was my big toenail rubbed thru the fabric on the top of one shoe due to negligent grooming.  I bought another pair (plus new nail clippers).

Liked: Color Lace adjustment Felt well constructed  Disliked: Shoes previously worn Velcro strap short - made fit tighter than needed across in-step. 评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: I was hoping this pair could replace the elegant but discontinued New Balance trail Minimus.  It can't.  This is a much heavier and bulkier shoe than I expected, almost like something you'd wear as part of a gorilla costume -- it even looks like it has toes ... which was a cool look 15 years ago.  The price is right, but the design was not.  I returned these and went with the Merrill trail glove.

The material is like neoprene, and they don't really tighten or snug up on my foot. I tried to wear these during disc golf and found they are just too stretchy. The sole grips during a plant, but fabric is so stretchy my foot can rotate a good 30 degrees without moving the sole. No arch support, looks pretty goofy. Pretty comfortable to walk around on flat ground, but I wouldn't dare take these on a hike.

评论概述: the size 11 fits good on my 10.5 foot.  that's U.S. sizes.  They didn't sell half size's.
评论详情: I wear these most often. But if hiking over rocky or wet ground, I will still wear hiking boots.

Too many shoes squash my toes so they are not comfortable to wear for more than a few hours. These shoes are comfortable for my toes all day. They don't have as much padding on the sole as some shoes, so they are not great for standing all day, but they are good if you are more active on your feet. The sole is pretty flexible, I can definitely feel the shape of the surfaces I am walking on through the shoe. I don't run much, just plan to use these for everyday shoes, but these are lightweight and feel like they would be great for running.
Perfect 👍🏾
Wide toe box, extremely comfortable, a substitute for CROCS!!

I am thrilled with the feel of these shoes! I would recommend a half size larger, though. The 1st pair I bought was my regular size (12) and fit very snug, so much so that my feet began to hurt after several hours of wear. I ordered a 2nd pair a half size larger and can wear them as long as I like.

I've had these for just over 2 months.  They are the best shoes I've ever had.  very comfortable.  I wore my running shoes, which are still pretty new to the zoo just to see if i could .  Almost instant foot pain.  Keeping these and getting more.  Great shoes!Holding up well, comfortable to wear all day long.  No trouble with walking, hiking, or basketball.

Bought these for my partner and can say it’s his favorite shoe! It’s comfortable, easy slip on, and the style is perfect. He uses it as an everyday wear!

评论概述: Mostly good with some flaws, just plain ugly
评论详情: Pros: shape matches foot and provides support when tightened correctly; wide, natural toe box; Velcro strap makes on/off and adjustments easy; sole is thin and responsive but well cushioned  Cons: fugly; toe nubs serve no purpose except to make these uglier than they need to be (no matter how comfortable they are to wear, they are uncomfortable to wear in public); elastic shoelaces prevent good fit and wear out quickly; replacement insoles aren’t available; the tread pattern could be simpler, it collects a lot of crud
For a fat guy taking his first trip to Florida and racking up alot of miles walking on pavement, these did amazing downside the velcro sucks and very chirpy tread design on floors.

If you have a history with Amazon orders, go with the recommended sizes. They fit great. Gave these a week of application with workouts and just general usage with no issues. Can’t run anymore but used them for other cardio exercises and weights. They can get hot but I’m not wearing socks to compensate. Then again it’s not the shoe but my feet so can’t blame the product. Just felt the need to mention this as a side note. Only need one pair but when they wear out and they are still offered, will purchase again z

评论概述: Lacking compared to other barefoot peers
评论详情: I've had these shoes less than 24 hours, so consider this an initial review only.  I own other barefoot runners (vivobarefoot) and the Whitins just do not compare.  First they are hot - the fabric on the sides and top is thick and retains alot of foot heat (Are my feet naturally hot?  No, I would consider them normal foot temperature).  Second, they don't feel like barefoot shoes - the soles are really thick.  The sole thickness and cushion is comparable to a trail running shoe than a barefooter.  Third, the lacing mechanism is awkward - half nylon lock laces with a velcro strap at the top.  I think a better choice would have been lock laces all the way up or normal laces.Who runs in these shoes?  I'm using them solely as flat pedal biking shoes so I think they will work, but I can't imagine running or walking in them.  There is a reason Whitin's sell at a steep discount to Vivobarefoots - my advice would be to spend the extra money for the higher quality, truly barefoot shoe.
These trail runners were nice and wide at the toe and front of the shoe, but they were too narrow from the middle of the shoe back to the heel.
It takes a while to get used to the feeling of less cushion but it has some cushion for your feet.

I took a chance on these because the ratings were too high and the price seemed fair - I was not disappointed at all. These are so light and comfortable, with just the right amount of ground feel. Fantastic!
The product appears well made, switched out the insoles with arch support. Looking forward to using them on Smokey Mountain waterfall trails later this month.
I have a little problem with the Velcro sometimes,  but its a good shoe.
Comfortable, and they even have some arch support. The Velcro seems a little strange, but for the price, these shoes are phenomenal.
Fugly

评论概述: Great first pair of Barefoot shoes!
评论详情: These Trail Runners are my first pair of barefoot shoes, and I really enjoy them! While I haven't worked out in them, they’ve become my go-to for running errands. They feel well-made, and after two months, I’m very satisfied with my purchase.

I’ve only had these a few weeks and the patch the velcro sticks to is falling apart. I haven’t even started running in them like I planned to. Also, some of the dots have peeled off leaving little holes. They’re also a little bigger than expected. Could have gone half a size smaller. Cool idea, but I’m sad they’re already falling apart.

评论概述: Not wide enough to get the shoes on. Epic Fail
评论详情: Even if a shoe has a wide toe box, if the opening of the shoe is too narrow you can't get your foot in. That's the case with these shoes. To put this into perspective I don't have this issue with almost any other shoe. I can even get my foot into Nike shoes although it's narrow when wearing, the opening is wide. Can't really remember that last time I was completely unable to put a shoe on. Buying this was a waste of time. I'm writing this review so you don't have to waste yours. Now I'm off to return it. Putting "wide shoe" on this is just trying to capitalize on the wide shoe/barefoot shoe movement. This shoe is neither wide nor barefoot. Do not believe their nonsense.
Used these in the Boundary Waters and they worked so well. Been taking these rugged trips every 2 years and this was the first time I was happy with my footwear!

评论概述: Wore shoes to “ break in”.  Shoes caused me a stress fracture in foot.
评论详情: Shoe caused bone stress fracture.  Not recommend!  Btw - the doctor that I explained the shoes to, said no real doctors recommend shoes like these. I suppose no one will come forward an offer to pay for my medical expenses.

Bought my first pair for a vacation to Costa Rica have been sold on these since. They are versatile for water, beach, and casual walks. They add protection to the top of my feet yet and are still cool in hot weather. I wouldn't recommend them for long walks because the insoles don't provide a great deal of support, but they have been ideal for an evening on the back deck, washing the car, or even a trip to the grocery store.

评论概述: The material is too thin and cheap
评论详情: These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn. Unfortunately the fabric is so cheap that they started separating from the plastic on the toes. They are not pretty shoes, not stylish, but they are extremely comfortable. Unfortunately, they have no durability in the material. I love the bottom of the soles and the grip they provide, but that’s no good if holes develop and they fall apart. You need to put better material into the uppers of the shoes.
the size is good for bare feet, if you want socks consider up sizing. sole feels thick enough to protect you from all but the sharpest rocks you might feel them.

I don't usually by inexpensive shoes but I gave these a try anyway and absolutely love them.  I can wear them all day long.  Performance is great.  They appear to be very well made and are holding up so far.
The shoe could not be put on. Sizing is not right.
Ran 6 miles when I got them and they handled it perfectly
My feet hurt after wearing these shoes. There's no protection at all, it's almost like walking in very thick socks.

On my second pair of these, I put a lot of miles on them.  Current pair plus on year three.  For the longest time I wore very expensive major brand running shoes and dealt with what I thought were normal injuries because I’ve always had them.  Took 2-4 weeks for my lower legs and ankles to adjust to these (first week much more so) but once they did I haven’t had an injury since.  Will never go back to high cushion running shoes… humans didn’t evolve with them, right?  This promotes a much more natural stride for walking and/or running.
So wrong and convoluted. I have trouble as it is with my wide feet, but you can't get the right size whether you measure or just use your regular "US size".

评论详情: These shoes are so uncomfortable, it feels like every step is a hammer striking your Achilles tendon. If you enjoy turning a simple walk into an exercise in pain management, these are the perfect shoes for you. The old adage holds true—you get what you pay for, and in this case, you’re paying for misery!

I purchased these shoes and wore them everyday, to get used to them. I've had the shoes nine days. I was looking forward to long wear.

评论概述: These work for my flat feet
评论详情: I have no arches at all so this was one of two pairs that I ordered.  I tried the others first and was concerned that barefoot style shoes might not be the thing for me, as they were painful.  That said, these were amazing and fit like a glove.  I wore them the entire day standing on my feet with no problem.  These are the keepers.

I had increasing pain in my right big toe, mostly from walking a lot for exercise. I ended up taking a break because the conditioned worsened. Read about wide toe box shoes, barefoot shoes, and decided to try these. After a few weeks, I’m almost pain free. I also have another pair similar to these, and a really cool pair of Xero shoes. Though these are inexpensive? They aren’t “cheap”. They are well made and quite comfortable. You can put your own arch support in, and the comfort and grip are quite good. Some other brands don’t have as big a toe box, so keep that in mind.
